live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
54097.summary: Some customers in the Rocky Ridge area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54097.title: Oct 9 - Calgary (Rocky Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
